评论概述: The crop mid section wayyy smaller than what's pictured
评论详情: The design of the hoodie is what I like most about it! It's a very unique hoodie and if the rating alone was based on style I'd give 5 stars. But manufacturing of this product is like 2 stars. The mid section that is the cropped part of the crop hoodie is way smaller than shown in picture here (comes up to right under neath the boobs) and the pocket is sooo small it's barely functional (can't even fit a phone in it). One of the ties in the back is partially torn after wearing it once. I have to sew it. The sleeves are nice and durable. This is cute with a sports bra under neath or a tight tank top.

Loved it! Good quality material — Wore it for a show in New York and was warm! It’s backless so make sure you’ve got a plan for undergarments! Sleeves were a little short on me but I’m tall/lanky so that’s not new for me

Love this hoodie. Super unique, warm and soft material, big hood - great for when you just need a bit of extra warmth on your arms and head. The back is completely open except for the knot/bow, so keep in mind this isn't something you can sit in a chair or lay down in since that's uncomfortable.

I purchase this sweatshirt for one reason only to get a back tattoo without having to remove my top. This was a perfect buy for me! Quality of the material is thick. The sleeves  are a bit barrel like and I love the fit and not too expensive!
La calidad es buena , las mangas y gorro son grandes y cómodas .

I was unsure about the price and sizing but it ended up being exactly as advertised. The back is completely open other than the tie which I did not realize until I bought it and it is very cropped but overall good quality and definitely unique.
